snippet: The plaques of five of the six recent inductees to the Baseball Hall of Fame will be leaving Cooperstown, N.Y., this month for some long trips.
lead_paragraph: The plaques of five of the six recent inductees to the Baseball Hall of Fame will be leaving Cooperstown, N.Y., this month for some long trips.

headline.main: 5 New Hall of Fame Plaques to Go on Tour
headline.print_headline: 5 New Hall of Fame Plaques to Go on Tour
